title: Logging onto chat service...
body: i cna't see my friend list and my group chat if anybody can help me ...

replies.body: Mines not working either along with a few of my other LoL mates.

We've received a few reports on this and a handful of threads about some players not being able to connect to chat, and we're looking into!  It seems to be intermittent, from what I've seen so far.  I don't have any information or eta to share right now, but keeping an eye out.  Hang tight!
same thing, started on the 16th. worked for a couple hours after running as admin, could have been coincidence, but its back to the "logging onto chat service" again now.
